TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CallerMemberNameAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class CallerMemberNameAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class CallerMemberNameAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 允许获取方法调用方的方法或属性名称。

span.span: Allows you to obtain the method or property name of the caller to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你将应用`CallerMemberName`属性设为可选参数具有默认值。You apply the `CallerMemberName` attribute to an optional parameter that has a default value. 必须指定显式默认值为可选参数。You must specify an explicit default value for the optional parameter. 你无法将此特性应用于未指定为可选的参数。You can't apply this attribute to parameters that aren't specified as optional. 有关详细信息，请参阅[调用方信息](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9cb2b8c0-c4f6-44b8-9c90-38948455b373)。For more information, see [Caller Information](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9cb2b8c0-c4f6-44b8-9c90-38948455b373). 可以使用 `CallerMemberName` 特性来避免将成员名称指定为所调用的方法的 `String` 参数。You can use the `CallerMemberName` attribute to avoid specifying the member name as a `String` argument to the called method. 通过使用这种技术，可以避免“重命名重构”不更改 `String` 值的问题。By using this technique, you avoid the problem that **Rename Refactoring** doesn't change the `String` values. 这是对于以下任务特别有用：This is especially useful for the following tasks: - 使用跟踪和诊断例程。Using tracing and diagnostic routines. - 在绑定数据时实现 接口。Implementing the interface when binding data. 此接口允许对象的属性通知绑定控件该属性已更改，以便此控件能够显示更新的信息。This interface allows the property of an object to notify a bound control that the property has changed, so that the control can display the updated information. 如果没有 `CallerMemberName` 特性，则必须将属性名称指定为文本。Without the `CallerMemberName` attribute, you must specify the property name as a literal. 以下图表显示在使用 `CallerMemberName` 特性时返回的成员名称。The following chart shows the member names that are returned when you use the `CallerMemberName` attribute. |调用出现在Call occurs within|成员名称结果Member name result| |-|-| |方法、属性或事件Method, property, or event|从中发起调用的方法、属性或事件的名称。The name of the method, property, or event from which the call originated.| |构造函数Constructor|字符串“.ctor”The string ".ctor"| |静态构造函数Static constructor|字符串“.cctor”The string ".cctor"| |析构函数Destructor|字符串“Finalize”The string "Finalize"| |用户定义的运算符或转换User-defined operators or conversions|为成员生成的名称，例如，“op_Addition”。The generated name for the member, for example, "op_Addition".| |特性构造函数Attribute constructor|要应用特性的成员的名称。The name of the member to which the attribute is applied. 如果该特性是成员中的任何元素（如参数、返回值或泛型参数），则此结果是与该元素关联的成员的名称。If the attribute is any element within a member (such as a parameter, a return value, or a generic type parameter), this result is the name of the member that's associated with that element.| |无包含的成员 (例如，程序集级别或应用于类型的属性)No containing member (for example, assembly-level or attributes applied to types)|可选参数的默认值。The default value of the optional parameter.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 `CallerMemberName` 特性。The following example shows how to use the `CallerMemberName` attribute. 每次调用`TraceMessage`方法，调用方信息将替换为可选参数的自变量。On each call to the `TraceMessage` method, the caller information is substituted as an argument to the optional parameter. [!code-csharp[csProgGuideAttributes#51](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/csProgGuideAttributes/CS/callerinfo.cs#51)] [!code-vb[csProgGuideAttributes#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/csProgGuideAttributes/vb/callerinfo.vb#51)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
